Package components

package components
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    components.players
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Card
    The Card class represents a card in a card game, like Uno.
    CardTests
    The CardTests class contains JUnit tests for the Card class.
    Deck
    The Deck class represents a deck of cards used in a card game.
    DeckTests
    The DeckTests class contains JUnit tests for the Deck class.
    Game
    The Game class represents the main logic of a game of Uno.
    GameTests
     
    SpecialRules
    The SpecialRules class represents the special rules that can be applied in a game of Uno.
